mapper.insert: insert into myPlace(mno, userid, nickname, mcategory, title, content, mytown) values (myPlace_seq.nextval, #{userid}, #{nickname}, #{mcategory}, #{title}, #{content}, #{mytown})
mapper.select: select count(*) from myplace where mno > 0
select mno, mcategory, nickname, title, content, mytown, regdate from myPlace where mno = #{mno}
mapper.update: update myPlace set mcategory=#{mcategory}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, updatedate=sysdate where mno=#{mno}
mapper.select: select nickname, userid, mytown from member where userid=#{userid}
